tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE unauthorized_access_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    username VARCHAR(50),
    ip_address VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE trigger_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    action_type VARCHAR(50),
    log_time TIMESTAMP,
    trigger_table VARCHAR(50),
    details TEXT
);
